Chapter:
Layouts
Here we include a list of all layouts.
An abstract layout defines a style for displaying the progress. This style can be modified via certain layout.
See Section for a technical in-depth explanation.
Standard Layout
This is the default layout used by the progress printer. It is a more user-friendly limited version of the tree layout.
printID
true to print id of process in the header.
false to suppress id printing. \leftarrow DEFAULT
printTotalTime
true to print total time.
false to suppress total time. \leftarrow DEFAULT
printTotalTimeOnlyForRoot
true to print total time only in the header of the root, if enabled. \leftarrow DEFAULT
false to print total time for each process, if enabled.
printETA
true to print eta (expected time of arrival/completion).
false to suppress eta. \leftarrow DEFAULT
printETAOnlyForRoot
true to print eta only in the header of the root, if enabled. \leftarrow DEFAULT
false to print eta for each process, if enabled.
highlightCurStep
true to highlight current process.
false to suppress highlighting. \leftarrow DEFAULT
highlightColor
"red" \leftarrow DEFAULT
See for available colors.
highlightStyle
"default" \leftarrow DEFAULT
See for available styles.
